document_data.name: Nightmare Lullaby
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed the caster to place a targeted creature into a sleepwalking nightmare. The targeted creature became confused. The creature had to be within {{SI|400|ft|long=yes}} of the caster for the spell to be effective. This range grew as the caster's skill level increased.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
document_data.History: This spell was found in Volume III of ''[[A Harper's Companion]]''.{{Cite web/A Harper's Companion, Volume III}}
